files.patch:
@@ -237,1 +237,15 @@
-#ifdef _WIN64
+#if defined(__x86_64__) || defined(__i386__)
+// see SharedRuntime::drem
+  jfloat retval;
+  asm ("\
+1:               \n\
+fprem            \n\
+fnstsw %%ax      \n\
+test   $0x4,%%ah \n\
+jne    1b        \n\
+"
+    :"=t"(retval)
+    :"0"(x), "u"(y)
+    :"cc", "ax");
+  return retval;
+#elif defined(_WIN64)
@@ -256,1 +270,16 @@
-#ifdef _WIN64
+#if defined(__x86_64__) || defined(__i386__)
+// Java bytecode drem is defined as C fmod (not C drem==remainder).
+// GCC since 93ba85fdd253b4b9cf2b9e54e8e5969b1a3db098 has slow fmod().
+  jdouble retval;
+  asm ("\
+1:               \n\
+fprem            \n\
+fnstsw %%ax      \n\
+test   $0x4,%%ah \n\
+jne    1b        \n\
+"
+    :"=t"(retval)
+    :"0"(x), "u"(y)
+    :"cc", "ax");
+  return retval;
+#elif defined(_WIN64)
